EOSC National Tripartite Event Poland 2025

 Download iCal file 

Add to Google Calendar

Add to Outlook Calendar

Add to Office 365 Calendar

Add to Yahoo Calendar

 What tools and infrastructures are essential for creating an open research environment in Poland? How may open science tools improve scientific cooperation? How to help researchers in effective data management? The National Science Centre invites you to the third edition of the EOSC National Tripartite Event Poland (NTE Poland 2025), held on 25 March 2025 in Auditorium Maximum, Jagiellonian University. 

 Description 

The EOSC NTE Poland 2025 is a perfect opportunity to discuss the role of Poland in the shaping of the European Open Science Cloud (EOSC), exchange the best practices in research data management, and go over the challenges ahead of national and European research infrastructures on the way to effective cooperation under the EOSC Federation.

One of the main goals of the EOSC is to create an open research environment that will make it easier for researchers to access data repositories, cloud services and advanced analytical tools. This will enable researchers from various fields to conduct research more quickly and effectively, using resources gathered within the network of European and national research infrastructures.

The EOSC NTE Poland 2025 will discuss the following topics:

Polish resources for the EOSC Federation (scientific information systems, national cloud infrastructure, national research discovery hub, national data storage)

    Polish Research Domain Infrastructures and their Participation in the EOSC Federation

    Domain-specific aspects of research data management (FAIR tools, data interoperability, FAIR and CARE, knowledge graphs)

In addition, the Polish node – EOSC PL – will be presented during the event. Together with 12 other nodes from all over Europe, it will participate in the process of co-creating the rules and mechanisms of the EOSC Federation during the pilot phase.

The NTE Poland 2025 will be preceeded by the meeting of the EOSC Steering Board and the EOSC European Tripartite Event organised as part of the Polish Presidency of the Council of the European Union. Experts from the EOSC Partnership, the European Commission and the EOSC Association from 42 member states and HE associate countries will participate in the workshops to jointly develop strategic directions for the further development of the Partnership, taking into account the long-term perspectives beyond 2027.

The EOSC National Tripartite Event Poland 2025 is organised by the National Science Centre, the Polish representative in the EOSC Association and national coordinator of EOSC PL.

Detailed agenda of the event

Participation in the event, both in person and online, is free of charge, but registration is mandatory (
registration form
 available until 17 March).

The event will be live-streamed on YouTube.
